ZNC is an IRC bouncer that keeps you con.string:
ZNC is an IRC bouncer that keeps you connected 24/7. Features include:

- Always-on connection
- Message playback when you reconnect
- Multiple network support
- Automatic configuration

Primarily intended for DBase network. Use on other networks at your own risk.
